question_text: A network is assigned the IP block 192.168.5.0/29. Which of the following is a valid default gateway address in this subnet?
explanation: In a /29 subnet, 192.168.5.0 is the network address and 192.168.5.7 is the broadcast. 192.168.5.1 to .6 are usable host addresses; .1 is often used as the gateway.
